c74object.name: abc.hoa.decorrelation~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.decorrelation~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) decorrelation process. This object have tree modes : syn, fx and man. The fx mode applies decorrelation to the ambisonics channels and the syn mode generates spatial decorrelated components from one mono signal at a given ambisonic order N.
The decorrelation is defined for each i spatial component among P=2*N+1 at the ambisonic order N in 2D and P=(N+1)^2 in 3D as a delay of 0 if factor is under 1-(i+1)/P and delay*functiontype((i+1)/P) in the contrary case, where delay is the maximum delay applied (in samples) and functiontype is a distribution function for durations. The user can choose this delay time distribution among 22 different ones. The delay increases according to the index of ambisonic components. But it increases at each step and it is modulated by a threshold. For the 2D decorrelation, the increment order follows the Ambisonics Channel Number. For the 3D decorrelation, the user can choose the increment order among 3 different ones. Therefore, delays are progressively revealed when the factor increases:
- when the factor is close to 0, only upper components are delayed;
- when the factor increases, more and more components are delayed.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: the ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: sets the mode of decorrelation. Possible values: 'fx', 'syn', 'man'.

attribute.name: delay
attribute.description: sets the delay window size in samples, also sets maximum delay value [init=48000, min=10, max=262144, step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the delay window size in samples

attribute.name: factor
attribute.description: sets the decorralation factor value between 0 and 1, 0 means no fx, 1 is full decorrelation [init=0, min=0, max=1, step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the decorralation factor value between 0 and 1

attribute.name: fdbk
attribute.description: sets the feedback amont value between 0 and 0.99, 0 means no feedback [init=0, min=0, max=0.99, step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the feedback factor value between 0 and 0.99

attribute.name: functiontype
attribute.description:
sets the function decorralation type [init=0, min=0, max=21, step=1]
Possible functions from 0 to 21 correspond to :
x, x^2, sin, log(1+x), sqrt(x), 1-cos(Pi/2*x), (1-cos(Pi*x))/2, 1-(1-x)^2, composite1, x^3, 1-(1-x)^3, composite2, x^4, 1-(1-x)^4, composite3, x^5, 1-(1-x)^5, composite4, 2^(10(x-1)), composite5, 1-sqrt(1-x^2), sqrt(1-(x-1)^2).

attribute.name: distributionmode
attribute.description: sets the distribution type in 3D [init=0, min=0, max=2, step=1]
